questions.question_text: Which type of firewall can act on behalf of the end device?
When an IPS detects an attack, which action can the IPS take to prevent the attack from spreading?

questions.answer: D. ACS uses TACACS to proxy other authentication servers
questions.question_text: Which statement about Cisco ACS authentication and authorization is true?
questions.answer_ET: D. ACS uses TACACS to proxy other authentication servers

choices.C: ACS can use only one authorization profile to allow or deny requests
choices.A: ACS can query multiple Active Directory domains
choices.B: ACS servers can be clustered to provide scalability

questions.question_text: What is the only permitted operation for processing multicast traffic on zone-based firewalls?
questions.answer: D. Stateful inspection of multicast traffic is supported only for the internal zone

discussion.content: Stateful inspection support for multicast traffic is not supported between any zones, including the self zone. Use Control Plane Policing for the protection of the control plane against multicast traffic.

questions.answer_ET: D. Stateful inspection of multicast traffic is supported only for the internal zone

choices.C: Stateful inspection of multicast traffic is supported only for the self zone
choices.A: Stateful inspection for multicast traffic is supported only between the self-zone and the internal zone
choices.B: Only control plane policing can protect the control plane against multicast traffic

questions.question_text:
What is the effect of the given command sequence?
crypto map mymap 20 match address 201
access-list 201 permit ip 10.10.10.0 255.255.255.0 10.100.100.0 255.255.255.0

choices.B: It defines IPSec policy for traffic sourced from 10.100.100.0/24 with a destination of 10.10.10.0/24
choices.A: It defines IPSec policy for traffic sourced from 10.10.10.0/24 with a destination of 10.100.100.0/24
choices.C: It defines IKE policy for traffic sourced from 10.10.10.0/24 with a destination of 10.100.100.0/24

questions.answer: D. It defines IKE policy for traffic sourced from 10.100.100.0/24 with a destination of 10.10.10.0/24
questions.answer_ET: D. It defines IKE policy for traffic sourced from 10.100.100.0/24 with a destination of 10.10.10.0/24
